knimeNode.name: Capture Workflow End
knimeNode.shortDescription: Marks the end of a to be captured workflow fragment.

fullDescription.intro:
Marks the end of a to be captured workflow fragment. The entire workflow within the scope of a 'Capture Workfow Start'- and 'Capture Workflow End'-node is captured and available at the workflow output port of this node.
Nodes that have out-going connections to a node that is part of the scope but aren't part of the scope themselves are represented as static inputs (but not captured).

tab.name: Settings
tab.option: A custom name for the captured workflow. If left empty, the original name will be taken.
If checked the input tables at the extracted workflow's input ports (table ports only!) will be stored, too.

option.name: Maximum number of rows to store

tab.option: The maximum number of rows to be stored as example input data table at each workflow table input port.

tab.name: Input and Output IDs
tab.option: Customization of the unique identifiers for each input port.
Customization of the unique identifiers for each output port.

ports.dynInPort: Outputs of the captured workflow fragment.
ports.outPort: A workflow port object that represents the captured workflow.
ports.dynOutPort: The outputs of the captured workflow group.
